data.title: Julian Levine - CEO at Twice
data.meta_description: Julian Levine is the current CEO at Twice, a position they have held since March of 2017.
data.text:
Julian Levine is the current CEO at Twice, a position they have held since March of 2017. Prior to their current role, Julian was a Senior Associate at Stripes Group from April 2014 to March 2017. At Stripes Group, a New York based growth equity firm, Julian focused on executing, valuing, and analyzing growth investment opportunities within branded consumer products, health and wellness, food and restaurants, B2B/B2C internet, SaaS and healthcare IT companies. Before their time at Stripes Group, Julian was a Senior Analyst at Bank of America Merrill Lynch from July 2013 to April 2014 where they participated on deal teams for follow-on equity offerings, debt offerings, M&A transactions (both buy-side and sell-side), and general client coverage within the Consumer and Retail sector.

Julian Levine has a Bachelors of Science in Business with a Finance specialization from Cornell University. Julian is certified from the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority (FINRA) in Series 63 and 79.

Some direct reports include Lenny Kravitz - Chief Creative Officer, Cody Levine - Chief Brand Officer.
